name: Birch
description: Known for its papery bark and quick growth, the Birch is favored in temperate zones. Whispers say its leaves shimmer in moonlight.

stages.name: Seed
stages.description: Buried beneath the surface, the seed hums with quiet energy. It holds the entire blueprint of the tree's future—waiting for light, water, and purpose.

stages.name: Planted
stages.description: The seed has been placed with care. Now cradled by earth and nourished by intention, its journey begins—still unseen, but already becoming.

stages.name: Sprout
stages.description: A fragile shoot pierces the soil, reaching for the sky. It's a sign of life, of hope—delicate but determined.

stages.name: Sapling
stages.description: The trunk strengthens and leaves multiply. No longer just a sprout, the sapling starts to resemble the tree it's destined to become.

stages.name: Young Tree
stages.description: Branches stretch, bark thickens, roots deepen. The tree now claims its space, shaped by wind, sun, and time.

stages.name: Mature
stages.description: The tree stands tall—resilient, proud, and fully formed. It may now bear fruit, offer shelter, or whisper ancient secrets to those who listen.
